price: pero glorifica con alabanzas a tu Señor y cuéntate entre quienes se prosternan [en oración para aliviar su angustia],
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
